content: A new version of the website available

comment.text: This translation key is used for displaying a notification about a new version of the website being available. It will be shown in a snackbar component when an "Update" button is clicked, prompting the user to load the updated version.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'متوفر إصدار جديد من الموقع' is a literal translation and doesn't flow naturally in Arabic. A more natural phrasing would be 'توجد نسخة جديدة من الموقع' or 'نسخة جديدة من الموقع متاحة'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: توجد نسخة جديدة من الموقع

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Vebsaytın yeni versiyası əlçatandır' is not the most natural or accurate translation of "A new version of the website available". While technically correct, it sounds awkward. 'A new version of the website is available' is more idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vebsaytın yeni versiyası mövcuddur

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "A new version of the website available" is a slightly awkward phrasing. A more natural English equivalent would be "A new version of the website is available" or "A new version of the website is out". The Bulgarian translation, while understandable, doesn't perfectly capture the intended meaning and flow of a more natural English sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the English source to "A new version of the website is available" and then verifying the Bulgarian translation against that revised source. Alternatively, assess if a different Bulgarian phrasing better conveys the intended meaning, such as 'Има налична нова версия на уебсайта' (There is a new version of the website available).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'A new version of the website available' is slightly awkward. A more natural English phrasing would be 'A new version of the website is available' or 'A new version of the website is now available'.  The Czech translation, while grammatically correct, doesn't fully capture the immediacy of 'now'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation that better reflects the immediacy of the English; for example, 'Dostupná je nová verze webové stránky.' or 'Nová verze webové stránky je k dispozici.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "A new version of the website available" is somewhat awkward. A more natural English translation would be "A new version of the website is available." The Greek translation reflects the awkwardness. A more accurate and natural Greek translation would better match a polished English version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the English to 'A new version of the website is available'. This would lead to a more natural Greek translation: 'Μια νέα έκδοση της ιστοσελίδας είναι διαθέσιμη.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Հասանելի է կայքի նոր տարբերակը' is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English phrase 'A new version of the website available'. A more natural translation would emphasize the availability to the user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մատչելի է կայքի նոր տարբերակը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'A new version of the website available' is slightly awkward. A more natural translation would be 'La nuova versione del sito web è disponibile'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: La nuova versione del sito web è disponibile

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "新バージョンのウェブサイトを公開" directly translates to "We have released a new version of the website." It doesn't quite capture the original meaning "A new version of the website available". A more accurate translation would indicate availability rather than release.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 新バージョンのウェブサイトが利用可能になりました (Shin baajon no webusaito ga riyou kanou ni narimashita - A new version of the website is now available)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure could be slightly more natural in Japanese. The "を" after "ウェブサイト" can sound a little clunky in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 新バージョンのウェブサイトが利用可能です (Shin baajon no webusaito ga riyou kanou desu - A new version of the website is available)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "웹사이트의 새로운 버전을 이용할 수 있습니다" (websaiteui saeroun beojeon-eul iyonghal su issumnida) is a functional but slightly awkward translation of "A new version of the website available". A more natural and concise translation would be "웹사이트 새 버전이 나왔습니다" (websaite sae beojeoni nawatseumnida) or "웹사이트 새 버전이 사용 가능합니다" (websaite sae beojeoni sayong ganeunghamnida). The current translation implies the user *can use* the new version, rather than simply stating it *is* available.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 웹사이트 새 버전이 나왔습니다

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ເປັນເວັບໄຊທ໌ລ້າສຸດ" translates to "It's the latest website" which is not equivalent to the English content "A new version of the website available". It doesn't convey the sense of availability or update.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation could be something like "ມີເວີຊັນໃໝ່ຂອງເວັບໄຊທ໌” (Mi vee-chan mai khong website) which means “There's a new version of the website” or “ເວັບໄຊທ໌ມີເວີຊັນໃໝ່” (Website mi vee-chan mai) meaning “The website has a new version”.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "A new version of the website available" is a slightly awkward construction. A more natural translation would consider the 'is' implied in the English and translate it accordingly. The Latvian translation, while technically correct, doesn't quite capture the nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ir pieejama jauna tīmekļa vietnes versija

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Nowa wersja witryny jest dostępna" is a literal translation but sounds slightly awkward in Polish. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the availability of the new version for the user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nowa wersja strony jest dostępna

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'witryny' (witryny) is less common than 'strony' when referring to a website in Polish in general conversation. While 'witryny' is technically correct, 'strony' sounds more natural and conversational.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nowa wersja strony jest dostępna

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content 'A new version of the website available' translates more naturally to Portuguese as 'Existe uma nova versão do website disponível' or 'Uma nova versão do website está disponível'. The current translation, 'Há disponível uma nova versão do website', is grammatically correct but sounds slightly awkward and less idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Existe uma nova versão do website disponível

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'අඩවියේ නව අනුවාදයක් තිබේ' is a literal translation and doesn't flow naturally in Sinhala. A more natural translation would convey the availability of the new version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අඩවියට නව අනුවාදය ඇත

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The literal translation 'අඩවියේ නව අනුවාදයක් තිබේ' implies the website *has* a new version, rather than indicating it's *available* to the user. 'Available' is key here.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: නව අනුවාදය දැන් ඇත

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "A new version of the website available" is a slightly awkward phrasing. A more natural translation would reflect this. The Slovenian translation is technically correct but lacks nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Na voljo je posodobljena različica spletne strani.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Нова верзија wеб-сајта доступна' is a literal translation and doesn't read naturally in Serbian. 'wеб-сајта' is an awkward construction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Нова верзија сајта је доступна

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The transliteration of 'website' using 'wеб-сајта' is technically correct but less common and less aesthetically pleasing. Using 'сајта' is more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use 'сајта' instead of 'wеб-сајта'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content 'A new version of the website available' is not perfectly captured by 'Nova verzija web-sajta dostupna'. A more natural translation would be 'Dostupna je nova verzija web-sajta' or 'Postoji nova verzija web-sajta'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dostupna je nova verzija web-sajta

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Web sitesinin yeni bir sürümü mevcut' is technically correct but sounds awkward and not idiomatic in Turkish. A more natural phrasing would be 'Web sitesinin yeni bir sürümü bulunmaktadır' or 'Web sitesinin yeni bir sürümü var'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Web sitesinin yeni bir sürümü bulunmaktadır

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "A new version of the website available" is somewhat awkward. A more natural translation would be "There is a new version of the website available" or simply "A new version of the website is available". The Vietnamese translation, while technically correct, doesn't fully capture the implied 'there is'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating to "Có phiên bản mới của trang web" (There is a new version of the website).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "有新版本的网站可用" is a literal translation that is not the most natural way to express this in Chinese. It sounds somewhat awkward. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the availability *for use* rather than just saying the website has a new version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 网站有新版本可以使用 (Website has a new version available for use).
